name: 6th Annual Single Cell Analysis USA Congress
content: 350+ end users representing internationally renowned research & academic institutions, clinical research institutions, healthcare organisations as well as leading pharmaceutical & biotech companies. 3 outstanding programmes bringing together Europe’s key genomics experts in Next Generation Sequencing, Single Cell Analysis & Genome Editing. 80+ case studies, solution & technology presentations & 2 interactive workshops. View Agenda: http://bit.ly/2Ophy8b 07 April 2019 – Day One • Single Cell ‘Omics Analysis: Current And Emerging Tools, parallel sequencing of single-cell genomes and transcriptomes and Spatial Transcriptomics • Single Cell in Clinical Use – Applications in the clinic & Diagnostic Development 08 April 2019 – Day Two • Interactive Workshop: Spatial Transcriptomics • Single-Cell Analysis In Drug Discovery and Development including immune-repertoire profiling • Overcoming Challenges- Benchmarking study on scRNA-seq technologies, sample prep and multi-omic bioinformatics solutions
